website_summaries.verdict: This primer for oily skin applies smoothly and helps create a matte look with or without makeup. But like similar products in this category, oil may resurface after several hours of wear.
pros: Goes on easily for an even finish
Doesn't feel heavy and isn't drying
Looks natural under makeup or worn by itself
Sheer formula won't clog pores and is oil-free
Blurs pores, fine lines, and minor imperfections
cons: All-day wear is questionable, especially in humid conditions
Doesn't do the best job concealing larger pores

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't do much to keep away oil on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't do much to keep away oil on my extremely oily skin matte. It does go on smoothly and interacts well with other products on my face....no pilling. I don't think I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: CryHTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: That's good stuff, right there!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I needed a good mattifying primer to get foundation to stick and stay on my nose!!! If you are a freak like me and can't get Foundation even stick to your nose, let alone stay there, buy a mattifying primer, this one's great, put it on there and then powder it, put on a little concealer, powder that, and then proceed with your foundation. Even if your 55 like me, if you don't do it heavy, it will not look cakey
customer_reviews.author: Dede V.Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Great matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I work in TV and this is a great matte primer. Better than OC8. Goes on easy.
customer_reviews.author: DenverGUy

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I tried giving this a chance but it doesn't work for my extremely oily skin. It actually makes me oilier at the end of the day. Wouldn't repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Diana V.

customer_reviews.title: Found my primer
customer_reviews.text: Finally adventured into the world of primers and after quite a few misses this is my choice. Reasonably priced as these things go. Much better than some I paid more than twice for. Not greasy, works best of all I've tried at controlling my very oily complexion. Not a complete home run in that I'm still shiny by early afternoon or earlier if humidity is high but it's made a big difference and again, much better than others I've tried. No breakouts, dryness, or any adverse effects either.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as Oil of Olay line filler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I buy the Oil of olay line filler before it was discontinued, I loved that product and this was suppose to work the same way. It doesn't. The color of the product is white, not cream like Oil of olay line filler. It does not fill in the lines or the pores the way Oil of Olay line filler does. It did matte a little but again not like the oil of olay. So, if you never used oil of olay line filler you might think this product works, but to compare the two Oil of Olay should have never discontinued the Line Filler.
customer_reviews.author: T2shay

customer_reviews.title: Seal was broken 🙄
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and have purchased at local department stores before. Decided to order a refill off amazon since I was ordering some other products. Seal broken when it arrived which is disappointing considering I ordered online and wouldn't expect it to be tampered with like you can see in stores. I'll be going back to the department store for my next purchase. At least then I can skip over the ones that have been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: This is suposed to be Infallible. Well it's not. It looks nice and fresh for a few houres, but not even that if you go outside. Then you look thick and greasy. DOn't dfare sweat. Even after staying indoors, it looses its effectiveness after 5 or 6 hours. This was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try Loreal because I love their products but this one was a disappointment. I have been using this product for a week and it does not work for me. I work indoors and within a few hours I am oily. I am going back to Mary Kay for a matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great primer for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer I've found to stop my face from being a complete grease pit halfway through the work day. I put it on before makeup (I use the infallible pro-matte), and by noon at work, my face is still ok, around 2 or 3pm I can use one oil blotting paper on my nose and I'm good to go until I wash my face when I get home. I'd say overall 4 1/2 stars because I still have to use that one blotting paper.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for day to day wear
customer_reviews.text: Decent day to day primer, it feels smooth on the skin. However it doesn’t keep your makeup from transferring on to clothing or wiping off by accident. Your makeup will look smooth but again it will transfer or easily wipe off leaving a blank spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Matte finish
customer_reviews.text: This product is GREAT for a matte finish...as good as or better than Mary Kay's Oil Mattifier and easier to purchase...have ordered a couple of times and will continue to use...doesn't work all day on a very oily face but I am very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more of this product, something that really control my oil when I have make up on but this is not. It does the job but no for so long and I think it’s not worth the price. I have use some other brands cheaper with the same quality as this such as Elf, Wet and Wild and Rímel London. In my opinion it’s really the same as this but cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice’s

customer_reviews.title: Keeps eyeshadow on all day and bold.
customer_reviews.text: I am newly playing with more expensive eyeshadow. I kept hearing about primer. This one does the trick. It kept my shadow on and in place all day. I will try it with my full makeup look tomorrow. Great value and product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay McClure

customer_reviews.title: Try it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this was the best primer for my skin type, I have very oily skin. This primer is great if you bake after your foundation / use a great setting spray. If you don’t, it moves and doesn’t stay matte. Also this little guy, CLOGS your pores.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Its nice, good consistency and it applies very evenly, is not a flat matte its a nice type of matte but i expected a little bit more, i still Got shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this regularly under my foundation, it take away the shine, and makes my face feel super soft. It also makes my foundation look so much smoother
customer_reviews.author: Begatha

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work great in humid weathers
customer_reviews.text: Not as matifying as thought, doesn't work great in humid weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent primer, use which loreal matte or pro glow
customer_reviews.text: A keeper. It melts so much into the skin and works to extend wear. I wound recommend to a friend. Maybe buy one. It's a primer. Does exactly that well.
customer_reviews.author: thatbooklynn

customer_reviews.title: bad coverage
customer_reviews.text: This does not fill in the pores like I hoped for. It is slightly better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely on face
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and think it is worth the money .My makeup looks better, lasts longer and it feels so smooth on my face. Happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: inlovewithart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing primer
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to primer. It works so well with any foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best primer I’ve tried. Works better than any of the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. Made my skin feel more oily.
customer_reviews.author: madOne

customer_reviews.title: Does not block shine consistently.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not block shine break through throughout the day. It also seemed to turn pink as the day wore in. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: This primer is amazing!! It gave my skin a flawless finish. It is a must have in my makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Its aiight
customer_reviews.text: I bought it twice so that says alot but i like to believe theres better ones out there. It dries almost invisible. And if its even a little hot it doesnt help.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good matte primer for combination or oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: A very good matte primer that I will recommend for oily or combination skin NOT for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nics & Ty

customer_reviews.title: primer
customer_reviews.text: I just received my primer The tube is almost empty And just received it this morning
customer_reviews.author: hector reyes

customer_reviews.title: It works .
customer_reviews.text: Thank God for youtubers who has the same oily skin battle. This is only product that keeps me shine free & oil free for a few hrs . Great product
customer_reviews.author: Stefannie

customer_reviews.title: “Does what it says on the tin” lol
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for oily skin, non scented, feels smooth like a moisturiser without the resudue. Love it
customer_reviews.author: K Needham

customer_reviews.title: Balls up
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many primers and this one performs "okay".. the primer tends to ball up and leaves patches on my skin during the summer months. You have to be careful with this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Chiamaka Promise

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for this primer. I have naturally oily skin and this makes my skin 10x more oily. You get a lot for your money and it doesn’t take much to cover the face. This is probably more for someone with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN LEGRAND

customer_reviews.title: Only one I’ll use.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only matte primer I will use. It’s the only one that keeps me from looking like a grease ball
customer_reviews.author: May Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It didn't provide the texture I like when applied. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: The last mattefying primer I will ever search for.
customer_reviews.text: This was the 10th primer I've tried in search of the perfect mattefying primer. Thank Gosh I finally found it! I have oily skin and without this primer all foundations and BB creams get very oily throughout the day. Without it, my makeup also tends to slide around on my face. If you have oily skin (especially in the T-zone) then I highly recommend this. I know it's a tad expensive but it has worked with all of my foundations, BB creams, and pressed powders. If you are looking for a mattefying primer, then this will be your last stop. But it isn't magic. I still use blotting papers to absorb face oils about 2X a day.
customer_reviews.author: amy allen

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, but not mattifying
customer_reviews.text: Does not mattifying as I expected but it makes my foundation smooth
customer_reviews.author: Pepluv

customer_reviews.title: Best of them all
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands and really like this best.
customer_reviews.author: Edmoore

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Works really well. Leaves a matte finish. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Came off while putting on make Up
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was my skin type but as I was putting my makeup It rubbed off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: Provides a light, oil free layer to smooth your foundation
customer_reviews.author: BKSCards

customer_reviews.title: good for the price, not professional for sure
customer_reviews.text: not extremely durable as expected, but works ok for the firt 2h
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, either by itself or under makeup. Really gives a flawless look to skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cas

customer_reviews.title: ... know if it makes a difference but I feel cool putting it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it makes a difference but I feel cool putting it on
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been wearing makeup much in the last year. It has started to become apparent to me how much foundation would look cakey and seem to get caught in fine lines when I do wear it. I had never tried primer before but read that this was a really good product to use so thought I'd try it. I can say that I will never go without primer again. Once I use this, the foundation seems more like it floats on top of my skin rather than settling down into it. Very little goes a long way too.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but don't notice much difference.
customer_reviews.text: I previously used the Magic Perfecting Base.  It is way better at smoothing and coverage than this primer. I expected the same 'full coverage' I get from this line of foundation, but it doesn't really seem to do much. I do not plan on purchasing again and will go back to the other L'Oreal base.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: My face gets very shiny throughout the day. I used to put a little dab of milk of magnesia on my face to soak up the shine but wanted to try something different. This L’Oréal infallible matte lock product did not prevent shine and oil on my face. I purchased the matching powder too, they both didn’t work for me. Waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Nilis

customer_reviews.title: This is Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I found this along with the makeup and have set them up on automatic order/delivery! That's how much I love these two items! With my job I sometimes have my makeup on from 3am to 10pm. I need to look good and this makeup and primer does exactly that! I Love It!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen W Bovay

customer_reviews.title: A good mattifier for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: If you are extremely oily I recommend doubling up with another primer when you use this product. Overall I do believe this is a good product. I do have it in my kit. This is for combination or lightly dried skin
customer_reviews.author: SpicyMamacita23

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to
customer_reviews.text: I have oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin. I've tried a handful of primers before this one. Most either break out my skin or cause it to look oily. This one didn't do either. Its light and goes on smoothly without feeling greasy. It has a lovely matte finish. And my make-up looks very nice over it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep the oil shine off my nose & forehead.
customer_reviews.author: SF Native

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't act as a matte on oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I love in TX where it's humid and very hard to find a matte primer that works. I feel this product makes my face more oily. It looks dewy, instead of matte. I even finish with a matte setting spray. It's just not at all doing what I wanted. Wouldn't but this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Holley Baisley

customer_reviews.title: Works better than monistat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using monistat total care for a primer, and I decided to try this out. It’s better! I did half my face with monistat and the other with L’Oréal and I could definitely see more oil on the monistat side! I’m a very oily person with large pores. This works well!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I would like this primer also matte my powdered bases a little better
customer_reviews.text: This primer is very good especially with the infallible pro-matte liquid but it doesn't help me or it changes the appearance when I wear it with the infallible but powder base.
customer_reviews.author: OR

customer_reviews.title: I really like this primer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this primer. It keeps my face looking oil free all day. It does not dry out my skin or cause irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Tamiya Bates

customer_reviews.title: Not for really oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really oily skin and this does not last too long for me.. within an hour of wearing makeup my face starts getting oily.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was nicely surprised to find it really works! I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Based
customer_reviews.text: It caused my makeup to pill, so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Does not help reduce oils what so ever. Which I could return it for a refund but unfortunately can’t.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. Pretty disappointed. Same for the illuminating primer. Does not illuminate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: works great, covers pores , stays put for 12 hours
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lairson

customer_reviews.title: Decent primer for slightly oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay primer. It does make my makeup stick better, but as far as mattifying my face, I didn’t see much of a difference. I feel that this primer would do better for someone who does not have very oily skin. It also doesn’t blur any pores so it doesn’t make a difference in the appearance of your skin.
customer_reviews.author: MaKenzie Hackney

customer_reviews.title: wao I am grateful and happy that I thought I would not get this
customer_reviews.text: wao I am grateful and happy that I thought I would not get this, love it It feels very soft when I slide it through my hand, I'm crazy to try it already.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Puello

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Makeup Infallible Pro Matte-Lock Longwear Mattifying Face Primer, 1 ounce
product_meta.description: Size:1 CountDiscover the secret for long wear matte makeup that lasts. L'Oreal Paris' Infallible Pro Matte Foundation Primer primes and perfects while it smoothens skin for a better makeup application. Face primer blurs imperfections and keeps oil at bay locking in a matte finish that lasts all day.
feature_bullets: Prime and prepare face for matte makeup that lasts! Infallible Matte-Lock Primer smooths skin’s appearance while blurring lines and imperfections
Pro Matte-Lock Primer smoothes skin to perfect your complexion and prime your face for a better makeup application
Matte face primer blurs imperfections and keeps oil at bay to lock in look with a matte finish that lasts all day
Universal white-to-clear priming formula is long lasting, breathable, and non-comedogenic, keeping you shine-free all day
Use the primer alone to stop shine and enhance your natural look or wear under makeup lock in your matte look

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
